headline: Students, Faculty and Staff in Salem City School District Gain Access to Clean Water Through New Hydration Stations
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., September 22, 2025--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., in partnership with New Jersey American Water, gathered with students, key faculty and staff members at Salem High School to celebrate the installation of new hydration stations made possible through the $25,000 State Strategic Impact grant. The ribbon cutting ceremony
